edge: This is Harman Baweja playing the character of Karan Malhotra in this movie.
In this movie, Priyanka Chopra is playing a dual role as Sana Bedi and Zaisha.
In this movie, Harman Baweja's love interest is played by Priyanka Chopra as Sana Bedi.
Karan's friend is played by Harsh Vasishta in this movie.
Another friend of Karan, portrayed by Karan Mehra in the film.
